Industries: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Data Storage, Smart Contracts, Software, Web3
Description: RedStone builds two products: A cross-chain data Oracles for Web3 & DeFi protocols; And Warp, data-driven Smart Contracts layer on Arweave.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: RedStone is a quickly growing blockchain startup, building two data-focused products aimed to unlock the potential of DeFi & Web3: 1. RedStone Oracles: A new generation of blockchain oracles with a novel architecture that optimises the way data is delivered to decentralised Apps (dApps).  RedStone provides 1,100+ data feeds delivered at a few seconds refresh interval to Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche, Arbitrum and 30+ other top chains. We support price feeds for assets such as popular & long-tail tokens, fiat currencies, commodities, stocks, NFTs floor and RedStone can deliver also other types of data i.e. transactions volume data or results of real-world events like sports games. Available feeds -> https://app.redstone.finance/ ; Sample integration on popular chains -> https://showroom.redstone.finance/ 2. Warp: A data-processing Smart Contract layer on top of the Arweave data storage chain. Warp is optimised for data-heavy use cases such as sophisticated gaming & social dApps, interactive NFTs, simple on-chain Machine Learning and other blockchain-based solutions that have not been feasible before, due to huge data processing costs on chains like Ethereum or Avalanche. Warp overview -> https://warp.cc/ ; Warp Academy -> https://academy.warp.cc/ RedStone Gitcoin grant -> https://gitcoin.co/grants/5477/redstone-new-generation-of-oracles-for-defi Warp Gitcoin grant -> https://gitcoin.co/grants/7733/warp-contracts-on-arweave-revolution-of-on-chain-

Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Health Care, Software
Description: Intelliseq offers a cloud-based platform for NGS data analysis and clinical interpretation, automating genetic data processing.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Intelliseq is a genome informatics company developing bioinformatics tools for diagnostics, therapy, and prevention based on genetic data. Currently, bioinformatics systems in laboratories are not ready for genomics at scale. The analysis process of already sequenced genomes is now mostly expensive and labor-intensive. In response to this problem the company created a cloud-based platform called IntelliseqFlow that allows for automated bioinformaticianless generation of result reports that accelerates the entire diagnostic process and reduces the costs that the laboratory had to deal with so far. IntelliseqFlow translates raw DNA data into final reports automatically, making the analysis step fast, simple, cost-effective, and user-friendly. Allows users to choose ready-to-use workflows for PGx, Germline Disorders, Somatic Cancer, and Polygenic Risk Scoring, all wrapped up in one user-friendly platform. It comprises AI-based algorithms, easy-to-operate pipelines, customized workflows, and APIs that make it simple to integrate its engine with laboratory information systems.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: #17 Europe’s Fastest Growing Technology Sector Company according to Financial Times.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Synerise is a deep-tech company founded in 2013 in Krakow, Poland, with offices in Warsaw, San Francisco, and Dubai. The company provides advanced and proprietary artificial intelligence and big data technology solutions in more than 30 markets for industry leaders in Retail, Banking, eCommerce, Automotive, Insurance, and Telco, processing more than 150 billion transactions annually. The company competes with the world's largest artificial intelligence technology companies by investing offensively in outstanding Polish engineers and specialists. Synerise is currently the fastest-growing Polish company in the technology sector in Europe, according to the Financial Times 2022 report, an elite British daily with an international focus on economic and financial issues, published in London since 1888. The annual report includes an in-depth analysis of tens of thousands of companies out of a million European firms. Poland's Synerise was ranked 70th in the overall European ranking while ranking 1st in Poland and 17th in Europe in the technology sector. At the same time, it was among the top three companies in the ranking dealing with artificial intelligence and big data. The company continues its ambitious growth plans, and in 2018 EY listed Synerise as one of the 30 most promising technology companies in the world. Deloitte, Microsoft, and Google have also awarded it.  Selected artificial intelligence products developed by the Synerise team are available as open source in the public domain. The Synerise team also publishes scientific papers in the field of big data and AI. This way, the company shares knowledge with the community and supports Polish science. Synerise is also active in popularizing knowledge and supporting education at the school level. It co-hosts the Understanding AI podcast. In addition, it has led, among other things, the first-ever program to support AI education in elementary and high schools - Synerise AI Schools, which has involved more than 2,200 students in more than 300 groups at 140 sites. The company cooperates with universities. With its attitude, Synerise supports educational initiatives in Poland by creating innovative curricula and teaching courses. The company has co-created award-winning first, second, and third-degree courses at universities. Synerise also supports charitable organizations, women's soccer sections, individual participants in triathlons, and invests in initiatives to level the playing field for the youngest in today's world. Synerise's scientific, research, and commercial work is recognized by personalities of the high-tech scene worldwide and in national and global competitions. In 2021, Synerise, along with international market giants such as Baidu and DeepMind, was among the winners of the KDD Cup 2021 hosted by Stanford University in the US. The competition, which has been held for 24 years, is considered by the technology industry as one of the most prestigious AI and machine learning events in the world - the competition is also considered the informal world championship of artificial intelligence.  The company has also won awards in the field of artificial intelligence in competitions: Booking.com Data Challenge and Rakuten Data Challenge. The most recent success of the Polish Synerise team is winning 2nd place in the prestigious RecSys Data Challenge organized by Twitter. Polish engineers from Synerise analyzed a dataset containing 1 billion tweets selected by Twitter in dozens of different languages (including Japanese and Thai).  Synerise is also the title sponsor of the 2022 National Chess Championships for Schools and Kindergartens to be held in Katowice's Spodek, where more than a thousand chess fans of the youngest age will develop logical thinking skills.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Sales and Marketing, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Jaroslaw Krolewski, Krzysztof Kochmański, Miłosz Baluś
Top 5 Investors: VTEX, SATUS, Techni Ventures, Carpathian Partners, Pawel Chodaczek

Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Aleet has developed sophisticated systems encompassing proprietary digital twin technology for strategic fleet operational planning and advanced AI-driven routing optimization. It serves sectors such as fleet operators, e-commerce, food delivery, civil services, defense, and more. At Aleet, we start by understanding the operating model of your transportation business to adapt our software to the needs of your company. Our Products: Digital Twin for Fleet Operational Strategy Analysis Fleet simulator Aseem allows you to test variants of expansion or changes to fleet configuration and demand, including demand prediction for a given or changed service. A simulation platform based on the latest artificial intelligence technologies dedicated to fleet operators in order to analyze and recommend the best decisions and operational strategies in fleet management. Dynamic vehicle routing and task allocation Route2 is an innovative engine based on artificial intelligence dedicated to creating delivery schedules and planning routes for vehicles based on orders. Route2 provides dynamic optimization of transport routes, capable of solving complex vehicle routing problems in minutes. Optimal routes determined by the Route2 module are, above all, minimized total transport costs while maintaining a certain level of efficiency, but also saving time needed for planning and ensuring on-time delivery.

Full Description: Neptune is an experiment tracker for ML teams that struggle with debugging and reproducing experiments, sharing results, and messy model handover. Unlike manual, homegrown, or open-source solutions, Neptune is a scalable, full-fledged component with user access management, developer-friendly UX, and collaboration features. Unlike end-to-end MLOps platforms, Neptune is a point solution that gives you only the capabilities you need from an experiment tracker and plugs into every stack.

Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Business Intelligence, Cyber Security, FinTech, Fraud Detection, Machine Learning, Risk Management, SaaS
Description: Know Your Users™ to reject only fraudsters
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Nethone offers a risk detection product designed to protect the entire user journey, from onboarding to post-payment, at the same time helping merchants to holistically understand their end-users (good and bad). With the Know Your User (KYU) profiling technology and AI-powered tools, Nethone blocks all risky users without friction to the good ones by exhaustively screening every single one.  The fraud detection software monitors and blocks over 100 types of fraudster tactics on websites and mobile apps, which are processed into actionable recommendations in real time. Thanks to a modularized approach, Nethone offers end-to-end protection, and addresses multiple types of fraud at every step of the user journey, from account takeovers, bot attacks, promo & policy abuse, friendly fraud to money laundering schemes.  Founded in 2016 by data scientists, developers, and security experts within Daftcode, Nethone is successfully cooperating with global ecommerce, digital goods, and financial industries. Since 2022, Nethone has been part of Mangopay Group, a pan-European provider of platform payment & wallet infrastructure. In 2023, it was recognised as one of Europe's fastest-growing companies by The Financial Times and Statista. It was also the highest-ranked Polish company in the Fintech category. The Nethone proprietary Profiler enriches the understanding of every single user with over 5000 attributes, which are processed into recommendations in real-time using a decision engine. While staying focused on the singularity of the client’s business, Nethone can help to lower clients’ rejection rates, costs of manual review, and risk of fraud, without touching the UX of the service--automatically and in real‑time.  Founded in 2016 by a group of security experts, financial business executives and data scientists within Daftcode - a Poland-based venture builder, is today successfully cooperating with 50+ global e-commerce, digital goods, and financial industries.  In 2021 Nethone was named Poland’s fastest-growing company in the ‘Deloitte Technology Fast 50 Central Europe’.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Information Technology, Payments, Privacy and Security, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Top 5 Investors: Plug and Play, 3VC, Expeditions Fund, Innovation Nest, Atmos Ventures

Full Description: We believe in access over ownership. Our lives remain cluttered with underutilized items, and our curiosity and openness to novelties remain unfulfilled due to constraints of ownership. Currently, the sheer number of options for using new technologies is mind-blowing – and yet, through ownership users limit themselves to specific products. Also, the modern lifestyle makes ownership troublesome through frequent mobility and scarcity of storage space. People are also looking for a possibility to reconcile the appetite for consumption with environmental concerns. With Plenti, users’ openness to innovation is exponentially increased at a low price. Description: Nevomo, the only company in the world able to gradually implement hyperloop-inspired solutions as an upgrade for the railway industry.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Nevomo develops the next generation of High-Speed Railways (HSR), based on magnetic levitation, linear motor and autonomous control systems, which can be subsequently transformed into a vacuum version. It is the only company globally working on technology enabling a gradual implementation of Hyperloop-inspired solutions as an upgrade for the railway industry. The company has developed a unique, patent-pending magrail technology, which allows modernizing existing conventional railway lines to a standard of passive magnetic railways, reaching speed of  300 kph (186 mph) on normal lines and 415 kph (258 mph) on HSR lines. The magrail system allows keeping the functionality of conventional railways on a modernized line (railway operators can depreciate their existing rolling stock). Magrail can be subsequently transformed into a vacuum system – hyperrail, reaching speed of 600 kph (373 mph) on normal lines and 1000 kph (621 mph) on HSR lines. The third generation is hyperloop – vacuum magnetic railways built within new transportation corridors for top speed of 1200 kph (746 mph), using subsystems tested in the first two generations. Capex for retrofitting railway infrastructure to a magrail standard are estimated to ca. EUR 6-8 million per km, which is comparable to the cost of building a new highway and up to 60-70% lower than the average cost of building a new HSR line in the EU. Energy costs will be lower by ca. 13% for the speed of 300 kph (186 mph) compared to HSR, whole for the speed of 415 kph (258 mph) magrail needs the same amount of energy than HSR currently for 300 kph (186 mph). The maintenance costs will be ca. 25% lower than for HSR, due to elimination of friction of mechanical elements at high speeds. The company was founded in 2017 and until mid-2019 it submitted 8 patent applications. In the first half of 2019 it secured an EUR 3.8 million grant in Poland and raised EUR 334 thousands during the first Polish equity crowdfunding campaign on a UK-based platform Seedrs.  Currently a Proof of Concept (PoC) is almost completed (ca. 50 m. long test track, which will be demonstrated in Q4.2019)., while at the turn of 2020 and 2021 a demonstration of the first full-scale prototype is planned. Corporate partners include TME Transfer Multisort Electronics and Microsoft. Key member of the R&D team is prof. Jacek F Gieras who has conducted research on Shinkansen SCMaglev at the Central Japan Railway Company. The company has got an international Advisory Board, including: Dorota Raben - expert in logistics & the former President of the Board of the Maritime Port of Gdansk SA, Amos Ron- former Director General at the Ministry of Energy and Infrastructure in Israel, and Vladas Lašas (also an early investor in Hyper Poland) who has co-founded Carbon War room together with Sir Richard Branson.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Transportation
Founders: Katarzyna Foljanty, Paweł Radziszewski, Przemek Paczek, Łukasz Mielczarek
Top 5 Investors: European Innovation Council, EIT InnoEnergy, Seedrs, MassChallenge, ValueTech Seed

Description: MoreGrowth is a technology startup company founded in 2022 in Warsaw, Poland. It creates popular websites and monetizes their traffic.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Done it a few times. We’re doing it again. Now, we’re aiming higher. Our mission We help millions navigate through crucial life choices. What should I do now to live to see my grandkids graduate from college? Will this mortgage secure my future or make it miserable? How can I create a loving bond with my kids? All these decisions have life-changing consequences. We help our users find reliable advice. The world doesn’t need more content—it needs high-quality and trustworthy content. We’re only interested in the most important topics in people’s lives. For now, it’s wellness, finance, and parenthood. To succeed and build some of the largest online brands in the world, we need a special kind of team. See who we’re looking for: https://moregrowth.com/jobs How do we do that? Explore First, we identify the biggest markets in organic search. By responding to people’s needs in these areas, we reach huge audiences. We hire smart people, who care about others, to join us. Build We make an impact through large scale and growing our business. We deliver carefully researched content and world-class products that make a difference in the world. Grow As we gain traction, we keep refining our products and growing the business. And we want our team members to grow as fast as the company does. Our story and brands Fueled by over 100 million visitors a year, our first three brands—Zety, InterviewMe, and ResumeLab—are one of the biggest career websites in the world. After we’ve sold them to strategic investors, we want to make an impact in other industries. Our culture Culture eats strategy for breakfast. Talented individuals guided by the same values will overcome any challenge. We gather people who deliver value, aren’t afraid to rock the boat, make mistakes, and draw the right conclusions. You never lose: you win, or you learn. See what we value below: Exponential growth What if you could improve how you do something by 1% each day for a year? It's not about perfection today. It's all about being 1% better tomorrow. - You optimize everything and find new solutions. Rinse & repeat! - You constantly and visibly develop your skills. - You don’t mind mistakes.You DO mind repeating them. So you learn from your fails. Real impact Results matter most. Instead of doing tasks, you focus on the end goal. - You don’t just do your tasks. You take initiative and bring value to your team and company. - You walk a fine line between speed and perfection. - You do work that matters. You solve real problems. Extreme ownership It’s all about the team. They depend on you. You won’t let them down. - You act like the owner of the business. - You own your stuff and your mission. If you fail, there is no one else to blame. - You know that when you don't deliver, someone else fails. Radical candor If you know something that will help your team-member improve, you say it to their face and expect the same from them. - You are 100% honest with your manager and team members. You owe others feedback. - Your team can’t read your mind. You openly communicate what you think and how you feel. - Feedback is supposed to be kind and constructive. Not always comfortable. Never anonymous. Impact is made through large scale. That’s why we hire the smartest people, who care about others, to help us build fast-growing online brands. We deliver researched content and world-class tools that solve real problems. MoreGrowth is the company behind rising brands such as Natu.Care, LifeAndMyFinances, Hello Finance, and HiJunior.

Description: Secfense User Access Security Broker is an enabler of all multi-factor authentication methods (MFA).
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Secfense User Access Security Broker is a network traffic broker that learns the traffic patterns related to authentication and builds an additional security layer between users and their applications. Secfense broker is not a 2FA method. Secfense broker is a tool that enables a quick & easy setup of any 2FA method or authentication standard available on the market and introduces it without interfering with applications existing code or database. Without Secfense broker, the 2FA integration often requires changes in the apps' code and then manual check, which can take forever when there are hundreds of apps to protect. Secfense broker streamlines the process by taking over the traffic. The broker knows to which app the user wants to log in, and it asks the user to apply the 2FA method that was chosen for this specific app. Thanks to the Secfense broker the 2FA implementation process is quick & painless across the entire organization. Our customers can also easily switch to any other 2FA method available on the market connecting it with any application or device they need.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software
Top 5 Investors: Tera Ventures, Presto Ventures, VentureOut, Mark Suster, RKKVC

It intelligently connects logistics coordinators with the various trades, gate keepers and equipment operators working on-site, as well as off-site suppliers and the drivers that work for them. By using ProperGate’s smart assistance in planning, registering, ordering, scheduling, unloading and reporting, any company can bring just-in-time material deliveries to its construction projects. And with efficient logistics comes reduced delays, more robust environmental protection, improved staffing, and ultimately a better bottom line. We have entered the era of sustainable construction. Construction companies need to be doing more to meet their obligations, such as monitoring CO2 emissions to reduce their carbon footprint and tracking waste fractions to increase their recycling rate. In a simple and intuitive way, ProperGate enables the effective management of processes traditionally characterised by disorder and unpredictability. Using its web application – designed to work on everything from a smartphone to a full-size computer screen – deliveries by multiple subcontractors can be easily coordinated, communicated, and monitored in real-time, and any issues can be quickly spotted and corrected right away.

Description: Minte.ai automates medical (insurance) claims processing. OPEX savings reach 19k mandays/year for an average insurance product (500k claims)
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Minte.ai is a B2B medtech/insurtech company. Our solution transforms the unstructured medical documentation "jargon" into valuable, structured information, which can be automatically processed by algorithms, and understood by humans. We qualify as an insurtech, as our current focus is the automation of medical (insurance) claims processing. After a successful production implementation in Uniqa in Poland (Dec 2023), and several Proof of Concept projects, we continue development of the Polish market, with a plan to achieve break-even in 2025, and beachhead in other EU countries in 2025/2026. The value proposition for Minte clients and the business case is clear - for an average insurance product (500.000 claims/year), an insurance company can save approximately 19.000 man-days. In addition, the insurer gets transparent and fast claims processing (which lowers customer churn), and data that can be used for fraud detection and product improvement. From a longer-term perspective, Minte is a medtech, and the solution may be applied in many other verticals, wherever mass medical documentation processing is essential. Those areas will be explored as soon as the insurtech line is established. The Minte Medical Model Minte is deep tech, expert-based, and extended with ML/AI, which gives them an unfair advantage over generic NLP/AI/ML software. The IP is 100% owned by Minte.ai.

Description: Digital Fingerprints is a continuous authentication solution based on behavioural biometrics compliant with PSD2 and GDPR
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Digital Fingerprints provides continuous authentication based on behavioural biometrics. We solve the problem of gatekeeper with privacy in mind. Our solution is contextless, based on Artificial Intelligence and swift in response. Credentials, tokens and other methods of logging in to systems are inconvenient and prone to attacks such as session hijack or account & credential stealing. We continuously check the behaviour of user to react in case of a fraudulent action. From customers perspective our solution provides invisible multi factor authentication method that protects them during the whole session. We look at how you do things not what you do. Our solution is compliant with GDPR and PSD2 regulations. We adapt to changes in user behaviour. Quality of models is configurable depending on risk model. Time to score is very low because of stream processing. Just be yourself and protect your accounts with Digital Fingerprints

We have an exceptional team of inventors, engineers, and scientists who seamlessly combine unique solutions, cutting-edge technologies, and hands-on experience to make sure your dreams come true in the best possible way. Bisonte NIX underwater drones are a family of unmanned underwater vehicles (UUV) of different sizes and designed for various applications based on the technology of patented ultra-lightweight  elastic variable geometry hull. Bisonte NIX is the lightest ROV for the hardest jobs: - Easy-to-control - The NIX Lite’s small size and the hull’s variable geometry allow it to stabilize itself and reach even the most difficult places. - Battery powered - The drone does not require any external power sources as its internal battery already functions up to 8 hours. - Next to no Infrastructure - Deploy the ROV anywhere as it does not require the use of a crane. Just deploy it in the water and get started. - Small Drone, Big Capabilities - The drone weighs only 100 kg, but can do the hardest jobs with its 102-megapixel camera, customizable sensors and additional tools. The most user-friendly drone on the market: - Bisonte NIX Lite was designed to create the most cost-effective solution that goes beyond just inspection. - You need to be able to act as soon as you identify an issue. - That is why the NIX Lite can be equipped with all the necessary tools to also maintain and repair the structures you are inspecting.
Industry Groups: Energy, Natural Resources, Science and Engineering

Description: Revenue management and payment platform
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: We are a SaaS company that offers a modern revenue management and payment platform.  As a lot of invoices are not paid on time and many businesses still inefficiently manage invoices via spreadsheets we build a solution to set effective and systematic revenue collection strategies. Our platform helps businesses to get paid faster, considerably reduces late payments and saves a lot of company resources. We create a positive impact on revenue and cash flow as overdue invoices are automatically chased - businesses don’t miss any invoice and act on every late payment ASAP. We facilitate late payment chasing and communication with clients using automated and personalized reminders (mail, SMS, voice). Instapay automatically reconciles payments, automatically detects late ones and if needed - sends personalized reminders or triggers predefined actions according to the collection policy set by platform users.   Instapay is a central place to track all payments and invoices. Thanks to the integrations with accounting systems, banking accounts and payment getaways we create a safe financial ecosystem, so that our clients could conveniently manage all invoices from one place. Businesses can also use our API to create customized data flows between their CRM or EPR systems and Instapay. Real time financial analytics and business friendly reports help businesses to easily monitor crucial collection processes in the company or identify late payment issues. Instapay organizes financial chaos, adds clarity to the company and assists in prioritizing and taking proper collection actions.    Instapay offers software that helps to: - create customizable billing plans (subscription engine for offline and online payments)  - create revenue collection workflows (automated payment reminders via mail, SMS, voice)  - receive money on scheduled time,  - automatically identify late payments,  - manage communication with clients,  - analyze financial condition in real-time,
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Software

Description: Safe deposit boxes 24/7
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: The Safebox24 brand was established in 2019. It was created by specialists with many years of international experience in the field of security, protection of personal belongings, banking and cybersecurity.  The owner of the Safebox24 brand is Idealbox Ltd., whose shareholders are Originators and financial investors - funds: VALUE FIZ - a qualified entity, supervised by the Polish Financial Supervision Authority and INVENTO CAPITAL, a venture capital fund of the Bridge Alfa type. The funds, along with the funding obtained in 2020 from the National Center for Research and Development, provided the funds necessary for the implementation of further treasury and deposit facilities as well as research and development works. The activity of the Safebox24 brand as an obliged entity is supervised by the Ministry of Finance in accordance with the Act of March 1, 2018 on anti-money laundering and financing of terrorism. Safebox24 meets all formal and legal requirements as well as the highest security standards set for vault and safe deposit boxes operators. We have implemented the best market practices regarding regulations such as AML or GDPR based on the best market practices developed by recognized private vault and safe deposit boxes operators in Great Britain and Western Europe. ​ Safebox24 guarantees the safety of stored goods through appropriately selected insurance policies, insuring its activities, property and liability, but above all safe deposit boxes and property of its Customers. The first modern Safebox24 vault was opened in Warsaw, January 2020. The vault is located at 49A Koszykowa Street, in a beautiful, revitalized tenement house closed to Plac Konstytucji. This facility was built from scratch in 2019, has the certification of the Institute of Precision Mechanics and safety certificates of all the technologies used, including FBI-certified hand and face biometry. ​ The first vault in Warsaw and the planned Safebox24 facilities are modern, certified vaults with the highest security parameters, equipped with monitoring systems, 24-hour security and modern security and Customer identification technologies. We are currently working on the construction of further vault facilities in the largest cities in Poland. Ultimately, the Safebox24 brand intends to expand its operations with a dozen or so facilities in cities such as: Gdańsk, Kraków, Katowice, Poznań, Wrocław, Łódź, Szczecin, Białystok, Rzeszów, Lublin and Bydgoszcz.
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Government and Military

Description: E-stado creates an intelligent management system of herd of dairy cows.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: E-stado creates an intelligent management system of herd of dairy cows, which monitors in real time the health, fertility and well-being of animals using biosensors. The main functions of the system include determination of the optimal insemination period, animal health monitoring including body temperature and rumination measurement, calving control and oversight of barn microclimate. The system is non-invasive and safe to use, based on the maintenance-free ear sensors, tail sensors and pedometers. The daily functioning of a dairy farm requires taking tens and sometimes hundreds of decisions, which should be accurate based on reliable data. Using a system, cattleman receives up-to-date information and alarm messages about each individual animal and barn conditions which is required to take specific actions. E-stado is not limited to reporting information but it also provides conclusions and tips which are easy for cattleman to understand and implement. A system of such a complex construction, supporting farmers in a comprehensive manner is a novelty on the global market. E-stado offers an integrated solution for automated diagnostics, which solves many problems that cattleman faces. It allows to eliminate the majority of mistakes made while breeding animals, which results in deteriorating health condition, occurrence of chronic diseases, decrease in milk quality and efficiency. The system created by the E-stado enables effective management of a herd of dairy cows, increases the production potential and profitability of breeding.
Industry Groups: Food and Beverage, Hardware, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Rebread builds an ecosystem to transform leftover bread from waste to resource
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Rebread is a circular economy startup, tackling the problem of bread waste. Annually, 15% of bread produced in Europe is wasted before reaching consumers, accumulating over 5 million tons of waste, amounting to a 12.5 billion EUR in losses (consumer price of unsold bread) and emitting 7 million tons of CO2. Through product innovation, like bread-based mycoprotein ingredients and non-dairy probiotic drinks, alongside supply chain innovation that connects suppliers directly with recipients, we are creating a unique ecosystem for upcycling bread waste. Our solution stands out due to its focus on impact, scalability, and a collaborative model that caters to both large industrial players and SMEs, whom we respectively provide with tailor-made R&D services and ready to implement circular production toolkit.

Description: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLES LANDING ASSISTANCE SYSTEMS
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: At the moment, low security is the main obstacle to the widespread use of drones. In many ways, the problems associated with accurate landing in places with limited zones. Until now, manufacturers and system developers continue to use manual control - as an opportunity to adjust the landing in those places where the accuracy of receiving GPS signals is limited. Existing systems do not provide reliable results in various conditions. Some do not work in low light, other systems have limited range and accuracy of determining the landing site. And in general, the existing systems are very unstable in gusting wind conditions, as a result of which the drone has to perform sharp maneuvers. That is why we decided to develop a system that will solve all these issues. Our main task is to make the operation of unmanned aerial vehicles simple and safe.

Description: We produce patented photocatalytic nanomaterials to purify the air from smog and reduce diseases transmission.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: NANOSCI has created technologies for the production of photocatalytic nanolayers that we use in our photocatalytic engines. The solution offered by NANOSCI is based on two patent applications concerning the creation of porous nano photocatalytic layers and the production of TiO2-coated nanotube material with extremely high photocatalytic efficiency. Our technology is used to remove air pollutants from volatile organic and inorganic compounds. We focus on the use of photocatalytic engine technology in the automotive industry and air purification in workplaces and schools. NANOSCI deals with the production of photocatalytic layers, designing air purification devices, and conducting research in the field of developing technologies based on photocatalysis and nanotechnology. Our business model consists in selling a license for photocatalytic engine technology to companies in the lighting, ventilation, and automotive industries. To ensure easier adoption of technology, we also offer components for the construction of photocatalytic air purifiers and specialized air purifiers according to our own designs. Progressive air pollution, epidemics, and endemic diseases such as influenza are the problems that are of key importance to NANOSCI today. Photocatalysis has the potential to solve key human problems as it can be used to remove CO2 from the atmosphere, treat water, and produce hydrogen. These are issues that will be the company's key business in the future.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Manufacturing, Real Estate, Science and Engineering, Sustainability
Founders: Adam Kądziela, Adriana Zaleska-Medynska, Bartosz Sroka, Pawel Mazierski, Radek Miszczak

It gives you the power to automate parts of your web push campaigns and lets you monitor all the information you collect, which can be used to create the components of various marketing automation scenarios. Our portfolio includes both small businesses and some of the biggest players on the market, including Pandora, McDonald's, 4F, MediaMarkt, T-Mobile, TUI, Travelist, ING, Tele2 and Eurosport. Web Push Notification technology allows to send mass & targeted campaigns and set up push automation. With PushPushGo application you can: - save abandoned carts; - increase return rate; - increase readership; - learn more about subscribers interest and build customer segments; - build loyalty; - use cross-selling and up-selling; - conduct short surveys and increase customer's satisfaction and engagement. 24/7 customer service and IT support are available

Industries: AgTech, Farming, Food and Beverage, Food Processing, Grocery, Manufacturing, Retail
Description: Fully automated and scalable vertical farming for supermarkets and wholesalers
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Muke is a vertical farming technology company that develops and produces fully automated, modular vertical farming systems that can be installed in supermarkets, restaurants, and other indoor locations like large distribution centers. Our technology uses 90% less water than traditional agriculture and does not require the use of pesticides or herbicides, making it a more sustainable and environmentally friendly way to produce food. We have learned our lesson from other companies' failures and invented technology that allows our clients to produce herbs, lettuce or exotic mushrooms at the price of traditional supply chains. It helps to maximize our clients profits and reduce negative aspects of growing and selling fresh produce (waste, carbon footprint, water usage) We were founded in 2021 by entrepreneurs and scientists who are passionate about solving the challenges of food production in the 21st century. We believe that vertical farming is the future of agriculture, and we are committed to making our technology accessible to everyone. Our technology is based on a number of innovative concepts, including: A fully automated system that reduces labor costs and improves efficiency. A responsive lighting system that provides the optimal amount of light for each type of plant. A multi-chamber cultivation system that allows us to grow a wider variety of crops. A focus on sustainability and environmental protection. We are currently in the process of commercializing our technology, and we are working with a number of commercial partners to bring our products to market. We are excited about the potential of our technology to make a positive impact on the world, and we are committed to making our technology as accessible as possible.
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Commerce and Shopping, Food and Beverage, Manufacturing

Description: Noctiluca specializes in the synthesis of organic compounds used in optoelectronics.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Noctiluca (New Materials) is a technology company based in Toruń, Poland, listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange (NewConnect market). It specializes in the development of proprietary advanced compounds in the field of photonics, which are applied by manufacturers of displays and OLED panels. The company develops and manufactures new 3rd, 4th, and 5th-generation OLED emitters, specifically those that exhibit Thermally Activated Delayed Fluorescence (TADF) and Hyperfluorescence properties. These emitters play a crucial role as key components in displays such as monitors, TVs, smartphones, wearables, or VR devices, as well as in various light sources, including lighting. In addition to its work on the commercialization of proprietary technologies, Noctiluca offers a wide range of chemical materials for the photonics market and operates as a Chemical Contract Research Organization. On behalf of our partners, our scientific team undertakes R&D projects in the chemical industry to develop cutting-edge solutions, primarily focusing on high-performance materials (HPMs). Noctiluca is a member of key international organizations within the photonics and display market, including OPTICA, EPIC, DFF, and SID

Description: We build vertical farms in different types and sizes - from 2sqm to 1000 sqm. Plus we grow healthy and tasty greens on our vertical farm.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: We are Future Friendly Farms, an agritech startup, growing healthy and tasty greens in vertical farms and building vertical farms in different types and sizes. Why vertical farming? Because it is more sustainable than traditional one: it uses 90% less water, it is 4 times faster, 50 times more efficient and more ecological with zero pesticides.  What is vertical farming? Vertical farms are indoor growing environments where plants are grown in stacks, in controlled, automated and perfect conditions.. Currently we grow 12 types of microgreens, for example rocket, pea, broccoli and red cabbage. We love them but it is just a start. We will add more species to our offer, starting from leafy greens, through tomatoes, strawberries and much more. But most of all – we want to make vertical farming accessible for everyone as fast as possible. That’s why we are not only producing fresh greens. We are also developing, building, and selling vertical farming hardware. We build for example: -        Office farms -        In-store farms -        Farms for schools and restaurants -        Small industrial farms, for example for hotels There are vertical farming companies around the world, but there are only a few companies building vertical farming hardware and growing its own produce. What is unique about us is the fact that we are combining high quality with much lower prices. Market wise: There are thousands of warehouses, retailers, hotels and restaurants all around the world. Our business model is not just a concept. We are already operating, our farm in Warsaw is running since October 2020, we are present in 5 Carrefour stores in Warsaw, we built 20 office farms for Orange Poland offices. We designed and built a farm called "Narnia" for an elementary school in Silesia, Poland and constantly are developing a portfolio of our customers. Both for fresh products and hardware solutions. And we know we can sell different types of products with a solid profit margin yet not premium pricing.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Food and Beverage

Description: Bin-e is a smart waste management system that uses artificial intelligence to identify the type of waste.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Bin-e is an AI-based smart waste bin, designed for office spaces and smart buildings, enabling them to achieve efficiency in waste management and reach green strategy goals. It combines most advanced technology to simplify recycling and facilitate the transition to a circular economy. It sorts and compresses the waste automatically, controls the fill level and processes data for convenient waste management. The smart waste bin recognizes the type of waste thanks to an AI-based recognition system and sorts it to the relevant chamber. Plastics and papers are compressed to decrease the volume. The collection service gets notified automatically when one of the bins inside is full. Each device can be easily managed via an app that shows the fill level of each bin, real-time data and summary statistics. An integrated IoT-Platform provides valuable insights into waste management operations that can be used to optimize collection routes, and save costs, time and labour of waste disposal. Bin-e is an excellent solution for easy and resource-efficient recycling in smart buildings. It enables the recovery of high-quality raw material and the reduction of CO2 emissions of waste transport.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services, Real Estate, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability

Description: Nourica is a seed-stage MedTech startup developing the technology of non-invasive diagnostics of health biomarkers from human sweat.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Nourica is a seed-stage MedTech startup developing the technology of non-invasive diagnostics of health biomarkers from human sweat. Our innovative technology eliminates the discomfort and pain associated with traditional diagnostic methods that require blood draws taken by specialized medical personnel. The company was founded in December 2022 and is headquartered in Wrocław (Poland).  Currently, we are hiring 12 employees dealing mainly with R&D of new technology. Our first product is a medical diagnostic tool in the shoe box size. Unique measuring strips are used for the measurement - the user rubs the skin to collect the sample and then places the strip in the device. The device shows the concentration of 9 essential substances in sweat, including cortisol, urea, creatinine, and others, which allow the assessment of the patient's health and, on this basis, the introduction of appropriate countermeasures - including recommending a doctor's visit, suggesting a balanced diet based on the needs of the body. We plan to develop two versions of devices- Nourica One - the stationary, table-top device that will be available in the medical facilities, dietician offices, and wellness and fitness facilities. The second device - Nourica Kiosk - is an interactive diagnostic kiosk available for users in public places, including workplaces, shopping centers, etc.
Industry Groups: Health Care

Organization Name: FSE Fabryka Samochodów Elektrycznych Sp. z o.o.
Description: FSE solutions will have a positive impact on urban and suburban transport and mobility, contributing to reduction of noise and air pollution
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: WHAT PROBLEM ARE WE SOLVING?  Reduction of CO2 in the city. In heavily polluted urban areas local governments in many cities in Europe (Paris, Barcelona, Frankfurt, Oslo) implement a regulation for clean zones without pollution. But inside this zones are existing companies living people with special needs (deliveries, post, shop goods etc.). Only electric car can enter to this special zones. FSE propose introduction of environmentally friendly electric vehicles for transport of goods and people in heavily polluted urban areas, through the production, implementation, maintenance and service as well as recycling of electric cars. FSE CO2-free electric light commercial vehicles and related services will guarantee that professional businesses that are engaged in all kind of urban and sub-urban transport can execute their job , even when city traffic is closed for combustion engine driven vehicles. WHAT IS OUR SOLUTION?  FSE has developed three different sized electric Light Commercial Vehicle Prototypes that meet the multiple needs for CO2-free urban transport of our B2B customers. E-LCV are operating in the industry of transport (goods, people, services), supporting the fight against urban traffic and climate change. Furthermore, FSE products will support the EU fight against climate change, helping to reduce the emissions of the driving companies/institutions in urban and sub-urban areas. Thanks to FSE CO2-free electric Light Commercial Vehicles green transport and logistics for citizens will be guaranteed without any limitations. WHO ARE OUR TARGET CUSTOMERS AND GROUPS? FSE is focusing on the B2B market of mainly professional drivers/companies which use their vehicles for running their businesses to transport goods, people and execute services with the vehicles, mainly in urban areas. Typical customers are all kind of craftsmen, utility companies (electricity, gas, water etc.), public services and all kind of people transport (kindergarden, elder people, disabled people etc.) WHY ARE YOU AS A TEAM BEST SUITED TO WORK TOGETHER TO RESOLVE THIS PROBLEM? We are a diverse team of highly experienced professionals full of passion and willing to act with unique experience in management and cooperation with the leaders of the automotive, industry and trade market. In our everyday work we face problems and challenges but thanks to teamwork and our experience, there are no issues that we can't solve.
Industry Groups: Manufacturing, Transportation
Top 5 Investors: National Center for Research & Development, EIT - European Institute of Innovation and Technology

Description: Quickstream™ - video over IP distribution, linear TV distribution

Full Description: Quickstream™ is a part of the 4vod group. Since 2009  our media and telecommunication company delivers broadcast and multiscreen services leveraging the latest standards. Our technical expertise: TV channel playout and management services, OTT applications, catchup TV, live channel streaming. We offer a tool for secure and reliable TV contributions over the Internet with access to the management platform set in the cloud. WHAT'S THE STORY BEHIND QUICKSTREAM? We are based in broadcasting since 2009 developing customized solutions and providing managed services for mid-size broadcasters. We quickly understood that making any additional deliveries of managed channels takes far too much time. We started working on an in-house solution that could optimize our content distribution workflow. After replacing our racks with servers with cloud-based services we noticed, that our clients and partners are interested in our solution. We decided to test Quickstream on the professional market. Only in the 2020 year, there were more than 250+ Quickstream instances distributing linear tv channels. MICHAL SUCHON CEO/FOUNDER OF QUICKSTREAM CEO OF 4VOD GROUP OUR SERVICES We are based in broadcasting since 2009 developing customized solutions and providing managed services for mid-size broadcasters. Only in the 2020 year, there were more than 250+ Quickstream instances distributing linear tv channels. Description: bNesis is the API-based hub which combines multiple external sources of data and various external scoring systems from third-party vendors
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: bNesis sets up a hub on credit institution’s premises that allows data transfer from multiple data sources (payment, eCommerce, social media, credit bureau and banking systems) to different, external and internal scoring engines. Risk department can test external scoring engines on the top of the current ones and choose the best, based on the actual results. Thus, will improve the accuracy and make the credit process automated and convenient bNesis combines multiple payment, eCommerce, credit bureau, scoring, social media and banking systems with all their functionality into a single solution, using their APIs. Instead of connecting necessary systems separately, wasting a lot of time and money on each of them, our customers need to connect bNesis only. In result, they will save time and money on integrations and their support.  With bNesis, banks get ready to use credit application platform. Any borrower (including enterprises) can easily apply for a credit online in several clicks. At the website or in the app of the bank, the borrower gives the consent to analyze his expenses, income or any other data by just simple typing his login and password. Data from accounts in other banks, eCommerce platforms, social media, credit bureau and payment systems will be analyzed by multiple scoring engines. Credit decision will be made in minutes and automatically.  Choosing the best scoring systems and providing them with an access to multiple sources of data with accurate metrics, increases the credit scoring accuracy rate. The bank will have less bad debts, will simplify the whole credit application process and will make it more convenient. Thus, bank will generate better interest margin and income
Industry Groups: Apps, Mobile, Software
Top 5 Investors: Startup Wise Guys, bValue Fund, Starta VC, SpeedUp Venture Capital Group, Starta Accelerator

Description: Poltreg was established as a spin-off from the Medical University of Gdańsk in order to develop and commercialize the patented TREG method.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: PolTREG was established as a spin-off from the Medical University of Gdańsk in order to develop and commercialize patented TREG method. Due to positive results of clinical trials of TREG method at the University Clinical Center in Gdansk, sharing this breakthrough therapy with as many patients as possible became the main focus of the company. During nearly two years of preparation prior to company’s establishment, business model, commercialization strategy and legal protection of invention were developed together with the University and research team. In July 2015 company was officially established with the participation of University’s special purpose vehicle (SPV), R&D team – patent creators and implementation team, experienced in securing external funding and managing innovative projects. PolTREG is the only entity entitled to implementing the research findings in the area of T-regulatory lymphocytes and using their growth method for clinical use.

Description: We're developing a game-changing onboarding tool to make the start and finish of an employee's journey seamless and engaging.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: We're developing a game-changing tool to make the start and finish of an employee's journey seamless and engaging. Our mission is to swiftly transform onboarding, allowing new employees to reach peak performance in record time. We're making a tool that helps everyone involved in the onboarding process work together, so new employees have a smooth and consistent start. What problem we solve? Unclear Ownership No one clearly oversees the whole onboarding process; duties are spread out, and this dispersed responsibility is inevitable. Preboarding Communication Breakdown After a positive hiring decision, weak communication with new hires can lead to them abandoning the job before even starting. Dropping Engagement New employees quickly lose their initial high level of enthusiasm. This decline is accompanied by elevated stress levels due to a lack of a unified plan, chaotic procedures, and communication gaps. Growth Challenges Scaling the onboarding process is tough and hard to standardize. Hand-Run Tasks Relying on manual tools like Outlook, calendars, and Excel makes it nearly impossible to achieve a high quality, primarily because they lack automation, integration, and real-time adaptability, leading to more human errors and inconsistencies. Solution + value proposition Guided Path A single platform that guides employees step-by-step through their onboarding journey, starting from the hiring decision moment. Collaborative Hub A centralized space for all stakeholders to collaborate seamlessly. Full Automation Complete automation of the entire onboarding process. Time Efficiency Reclaiming valuable time by automating repetitive tasks, allowing for a focus on transferring essential know-how. Personalized Communication Tailoring communication to each employee's unique needs and preferences. Usage Based Pricing Pay only when we deliver value. We charge based on started process.
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Health Care, Other, Software

Description: Transforming AI with Graph-based Memory and Knowledge
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Galaxia™ - a pioneering graph technology designed for automation. -- In-memory Graph Model: Galaxia is a novel proprietary graph technology - a graph language model - with built-in NLP. -- Automated Graph Construction: Automated transformation of analyzed text into a custom graph knowledge model. -- No need for chunking: Smabbler Galaxia can process 20 million chars at once, or roughly almost 7,000 pages of text. -- RAM / CPU processing: The whole thing runs on cost and energy efficient CPUs. -- Knowledge Augmentation: Multidomain knowledge graph acts as graph embeddings enriching analyzed text. -- Embedded Graph Retrieval: Automated retrieval is a graph native function. No additional graph query language is needed.

BOOSTER uses green propellants, that are negligible in cost, easy to handle and are qualified to fly onboard all launchers and rideshares. Description: Shorte.st is a business that uses link shortening software and advertising networks to maximize website revenue.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Shorte.st is a link shortening service that gives users a posibility to earn on every link they shrink. How it works? 1. User shortens a link with our shortener.  2. He posts a short link on social media, web page or blog.  3. User gets paid every time the link is visited. Project isn't innovative - but it’ll be - just give us some time. There are similar services on the internet but we’ve noticed that there is a high demand for sites that provides an easy way to earn money online. In order to confirm our hipothesis we've launched few landing pages with forms to collect users' feedback about our assumptions. Shorte.st was created with that feedback in mind. We’ve shown simple to use, beautiful designed system with neat brand hero.  Since Shorte.st started team managed to get over 20,000 users registered as well as 1,5 milion links shortened. That is just the beginning. We aim to develop a system with accurately targeted ads, which will be beneficial for both - the advertisers and the publishers - said Kornel Szwaja, Shorte.st Product Manager. Shorte.st offers a wide range of tools for publishers: - Scripts - API - WordPress plugin - Tumblr monetization codes

They specialise in: - Input & output API creation - Desktop & web applications creation - Data collection & delivery - Data processing & merging Most common use-cases: - Rebuilding monolithic systems for fast and light microservices  - Obtaining data from problematic sources limited by Captche and difficult databases (e.g. archaic legacy systems) - Data hygiene and/or enrichment - Data science (e.g. risk models) Transparent Data supports digital transformation by efficiently automating complex processes and shortening hours of searching and analyzing data to several minutes.

Description: Data-Driven Construction Control
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Hustro is a software system that leads construction professionals in assuring and controlling quality, health and safety, and environmental aspects of even the most complex construction projects. Hustro focuses on making site decisions as easy and fast as possible, to help solve site issues before they generate conflicts between general contractors, subcontractors, and investors. This goal is being achieved l by providing standardized data structures and workflows closely connected to construction projects, showcasing the impact of each issue on the project goals, and mitigating legal and financial risks in the background. The system consists of a mobile app that engages site project teams in data collection processes where it has the most value and web tools that help with planning corrective actions, inspections, or making process decisions based on built-in reporting and analytics modules. In a little over a year, Hustro helped users to reduce the on-site decision-making time by 47%, and decrease issue resolution time by over 40%. All of this while saving over 70% time usually spent on QHSE management.

Description: Social WiFi helps businesses to provide their customers a better digital experience that drives return visits and online recommendations.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: WHY AND WHAT WE DO Social WiFi helps brick & mortar businesses communicate with their guests and customers and provide a better digital experience that drives return visits and online recommendations. PROBLEM Brick & mortar businesses rely on two things, returning customers and new customers. Businesses have no scalable way of knowing who their customers are and how to encourage them to return once they have left. Nor can they ask each of them to recommend them to others. SOLUTION We answer 4 key questions for business operators: Who are their customers? How happy are they? Do/will they come back? Will they recommend you? Guest WiFi is the mechanism that triggers this process and our automation tools delivery communications to drive more visits. Social WiFi sell primarily to the hospitality and retail sectors, with particular strength in hotels. Our clients do include shopping malls, offices and stadia also. COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES Integrated into 95%+ of the enterprise hardware market. Setup in minutes.  SaaS model = no contracts. Easy to do business with. Offer free trial at no cost to us. Business name is industry name. Trademarked in EU. MARKET There are over 207 million open hot spots worldwide. • 30 million of those are in the retail and hospitality sectors. • 1.2 million of those are in the US only. • Each location has a potential of $4,000 yearly recurring revenue. • The market is worth $4.8bn per year. • Less than 2% of the market is covered with solutions that identify WiFi users. Social WiFi is highly scalable.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Other, Professional Services, Software
Top 5 Investors: SATUS, Rafał Brzoska, Akcelerator Innowacji NOT

Description: DrOmnibus provides digital platform supporting therapy of children with developmental disorders.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: DrOmnibus develops digital platform that support therapy of children with behavioural and developmental disorders, especially Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). The product „ABA DrOmnibus” is comprised of a series of games with thousands therapeutic tasks, progress monitoring system and therapy organizer and can by used at home or in a therapeutic setting by a child with his or her parent, teacher or medical professional.  Based on the principles of Applied Behaviour Analysis, which is considered most effective therapy methodology the DrOmnibus app automatically adapts to the specific capabilities of each child to help him or her learn basic social and cognitive skills, exercise concentration, maintain attention, coordinate visual and motor skills and enhance logical thinking and memory. The app also includes a reporting function that can generate reports and statistics on the progress.

Description: Recognize.im is mobile technology firm provides image recognition technology to create your own mobile application.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: iTraff Technology Sp. z o.o. was founded in 2010 as an initiative of Arkadiusz Skuza, Wojciech Radomski, Paweł Elbanowski and Marcin Szajek. The company empowers mobile and web developers to utilize the Image Recognition Technology with Recognize.im API. Recognize.im API allows businesses to quickly build image recognition into their own mobile and web applications. The setup is quick: upload your reference pictures to Recognize.im, and use the ready-made code available on the website. In a few minutes your platform will feature a built-in image recognition technology. This type of solution promotes genuine customer engagement and sales carried out via the mobile channel in virtually any consumer-facing industry. Recently, the Recognize.im Team has been focusing on supporting merchandising with image recognition technology by providing a special recognition mode that enables locating products on shop shelves. The idea is to enable real-time monitoring of shelf contents with unparalleled precision, thanks to which it will be possible to obtain various kinds of reports, such as compatibility planograms or comparisons to the competition. In addition to the above, hardware support for the described algorithmic engine is being prototyped in the form of a network of simple, low-cost devices installed on premises, enabling constant monitoring of the products in stores. So far technology developed by iTraff technology has enabled the creation of many applications in the fields of e-commerce, publishing, advertising, or affiliated with major brands. Partnership projects are carried out with companies like Evernote or Facebook. The company has also collected a number of awards for its implementations, including competitions in the United States, Austria, Finland, Greece, Poland and Belgium (including the prize awarded by the European Commission Commissioner for the Digital Agenda, Neelie Kroes).
Industry Groups: Apps, Data and Analytics, Mobile, Platforms, Software

Description: Optimize websites for better user experience and higher conversion
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: UsabilityTools was created by User Experience Designers fed up with web testing apps providing partial solutions. The core value of UsabilityTools is combining power of remote usability research with lean philosophy. Secondary goal of co-founders was to make usability testing affordable for every researcher either amateur or professional. UsabilityTools platform comprises two main parts: Conversion Suite Click Tracking - Visualize clicks and mouse moves, discover which areas draw visitors’ attention and which go unnoticed. Form Tester - Learn how visitors interact with each field and find out which steps in the process cause dropouts.  Visitor Recording - See your website from the users' perspective and learn from their behavior. Capture every mouse move, click and keystroke.  Feedback Form - Increase visitors’ satisfaction by discovering how your website can meet their needs.  User Experience Suite Click Testing - Ask respondents about your visual designs. Gather feedback on specific areas of your layouts or marketing creations.  Web Testing - Find improvement opportunities by testing the usability on large numbers of people.  Card Sorting - Build successful information architecture that helps people navigate through your content easily.  Survey - Engage the respondents and get rock-solid data in real time.
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Design, Other, Professional Services, Software

This is what we are focusing on. Gaming Live aims to become the most important medium of information and entertainment for millions of gaming enthusiasts, who prefer to find everything they need in one place. The content producers will find various tools to monetize their activities and reach massive audiences. Gaming Live’s users will be able to interact with the video content in a completely new dimension and the content producers will directly reach their fans and potential clients.
